content.new:
Description:

Add a feature that allows the execution of small or time-critical scripts within the context of an individual labscript shot.  The intended application of this tool is for cases where in-shot or time-critical processing of data is require

Description:

Add a feature that allows the execution of small or time-critical scripts within the context of an individual labscript shot.  The intended application of this tool is for cases where in-shot or time-critical processing of data is require

title.new: Execution of small or time-critical analysis scripts as part of running shot

issue.title: Execution of small or time-critical analysis scripts as part of running shot
